<cs> my lords i am advised that i have not given your lordships all the information that you should have had and there are some rather important points that i should mention <e> <s> what i said earlier was not totally comprehensive <e> <s> amendments nos <e> <s> and arc technical amendments dealing with interpretation <e> <s> amendment no <e> <s> relocates in a single subsection the interpretation provisions contained in clause and other clauses to the new clause on exclusive copyright licences which amend the restrictive trade practices legislation <e> <s> it mirrors clause and which make similar provisions for clauses to of the bill <e> <s> the remaining amendments in this group are all consequential with the exception of amendment no <e> <s> which includes the expression the director within the interpretation provisions of clauses to <e> <s> with that further enlightenment i commend the amendments <e>
